post.description: Registers a new user based on the user type (tourist, tourGuide, advertiser, seller).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of user to register (tourist, tourGuide, advertiser, seller).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: User registration details.

mobileNum.description: The mobile number of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

nation.description: The nationality of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

dob.description: The date of birth of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

profession.description: The profession of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

400.description: Bad request due to missing input.

409.description: Conflict due to existing username or email.

post.description: Creates a new historical tag associated with cultural heritage.

period.description: The historical period associated with the tag.

get.description: Get activity details based on the provided activity ID and user ID. Only 'advertiser' type users can access this endpoint.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the activity to retrieve.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user requesting the activity.

400.description: Invalid input or user type.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing activity.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the activity to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the update.

date.description: The updated date of the activity.

time.description: The updated time of the activity.

location.description: The updated location of the activity.

price.description: The updated price of the activity.

category.description: The updated ID of the category for the activity.

tags.description: Updated tags associated with the activity.

specialDiscounts.description: Updated special discounts for the activity.

isOpen.description: Indicates if the activity is open.

tags.description: Updated tags associated with the activity.

specialDiscounts.description: Updated special discounts for the activity.

isOpen.description: Indicates if the activity is open.

parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

directions.example: Take bus number 5 to reach the destination.

parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.
